bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Robot Map Data Representation for Navigation
IEEE Standard for Robot Map Data Representation for Navigation
bibdata.docidentifier: 1873-2015 IEEE Standard for Robot Map Data Representation for Navigation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A map data representation of environments of a mobile robot performing a navigation task is specified in this standard. It provides data models and data formats for two-dimensional (2D) metric and topological maps.

A map data representation of environments of a mobile robot performing a navigation task is specified in this standard. It provides data models and data formats for two-dimensional (2D) metric and topological maps.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
